name.en: Seminar on the Corporate Law and Intellectual Property Law
name.ch: 企業組織與智財法分析

notice.ch: 星期六或日9:00~17:00，課表及教室安排後將另發通知。

department.ch: 產業經濟研究所碩士班

remark.ch: 星期六或日9:00~17:00，課表及教室安排後將另發通知。

goal.ch: This course intends to highlight some of the most challenging issues in intellectual property law in the 21th century. It does not intend to cover the whole ground (this is a vast field after all).
goal.en: This course intends to highlight some of the most challenging issues in intellectual property law in the 21th century. It does not intend to cover the whole ground (this is a vast field after all).

outline.ch:
"The course will be divided into two parts:
1. Overview of the IP legal systems.
2. Selected Leading cases."
outline.en:
"The course will be divided into two parts:
1. Overview of the IP legal systems.
2. Selected Leading cases."

textbook.ch:
謝銘洋，智慧財產權法 (最新版)。
蔡明誠，專利法 (最新版)。
Jonathan M. Barnett, Innovators, Firms, and Markets: The Organizational Logic of Intellectual Property (2021).
Robert P. Merges, Peter S. Menell & Mark A. Lemley, Intellectual Property in the New Technological Age (newest ed.).
Paul Goldstein, Copyright’s Highway: From the Printing Press to the Cloud, Second Edition (2d ed. 2019).
Alan L. Durham, Patent Law Essentials: A Concise Guide, 5th Edition (5th ed. 2018).
Dan L. Burk & Mark A. Lemley, The Patent Crisis and How the Courts Can Solve It (2009).
The Cambridge Handbook of International and Comparative Trademark Law (Irene Calboli & Jane C. Ginsburg eds., 2020).
textbook.en:
謝銘洋，智慧財產權法 (最新版)。
蔡明誠，專利法 (最新版)。
Jonathan M. Barnett, Innovators, Firms, and Markets: The Organizational Logic of Intellectual Property (2021).
Robert P. Merges, Peter S. Menell & Mark A. Lemley, Intellectual Property in the New Technological Age (newest ed.).
Paul Goldstein, Copyright’s Highway: From the Printing Press to the Cloud, Second Edition (2d ed. 2019).
Alan L. Durham, Patent Law Essentials: A Concise Guide, 5th Edition (5th ed. 2018).
Dan L. Burk & Mark A. Lemley, The Patent Crisis and How the Courts Can Solve It (2009).
The Cambridge Handbook of International and Comparative Trademark Law (Irene Calboli & Jane C. Ginsburg eds., 2020).

gradMethod.ch:
"Participation: 40%, in classes and on the mailing list. (Mere attendance or forwarding news articles DOES NOT count as participation.)
Case Study Paper and Presentation: 60%."
gradMethod.en:
"Participation: 40%, in classes and on the mailing list. (Mere attendance or forwarding news articles DOES NOT count as participation.)
Case Study Paper and Presentation: 60%."

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力

ch: 學制:限碩士在職專班。學院:限管理學院。系所:限產業經濟研究所碩士在職專班。
en: Type:In-service Master's Program only.Faculty:College of Management only.Department:Master of Industrial Economics in-service only.
